mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(yzvin001.cheh, -2) as sub_type, count(*) as num FROM cwfl_new, tycw101, tycp201, yzvin001, tycw100, tyjcdict, tyjc041, tyjc021, tysc301, tyjc061, tyxs211, tycp202 WHERE tycw100.faph = tycw101.faph AND tycw100.danjlb = tycw101.danjlb AND tycw100.danjlb = tyjcdict.zhidxh(+) AND tyjcdict.zhidlb = '1603' AND tyjcdict.zhidxh LIKE 'S%' AND tycw101.vin = yzvin001.vin(+) AND tycw100.bizh = tyjc041.huob(+) AND tycw100.kehu = tyjc021.kehu(+) AND yzvin001.jisgf = tycp201.xiangm(+) AND tycp201.cwfl1 = cwfl_new.fl(+) AND tycw101.vin = tysc301.vin(+) AND tycw101.wuliao = tyjc061.wuliao(+) AND tycp201.gongcbh = tycp202.gongcbh(+) AND tycp202.heth = tyxs211.heth(+) AND tycw100.kaiprq >= #{startDate} AND tycw100.kaiprq < #{endDate} AND REGEXP_LIKE(SUBSTR(yzvin001.cheh, -2), '^([a-zA-Z]|-)*$') AND tyjcdict.shuom IN ('机动车专用发票', '销售增值税发票') AND tycp201.naiwx !='外销' AND （cwfl_new.shuom like '%液罐%' or cwfl_new.shuom like '%箱%'） GROUP BY SUBSTR(yzvin001.cheh, -2)
